text:
Brother Thelonius/ Part time friend, full time friar/ And patron saint of Bottled Bebop.™

/ You give my frigid night/ A needed warmth,/ Bubbled in a brooding brew:/ Imbibe it

/ Best absorbed on the sidewalk/ Lifeline, sweet record/ Slow-spinning inside.

/ That deft, adept set of hands/ Playing the melodies that move them,/ Keyboard spun in a halo,/ Mindful crowd soaking it in./
